entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix and clean up the handling of "must contain" `LEA`s on ARM64 #74448
    8.0.0
  • Native crash in System.Text.Json.Tests in mono Linux x64 #74443
  • [Perf] ubuntu 18.04/x64 : Regressions in System.Memory.Span<Byte> on 8/18/2022 3:00:51 AM #74437
  • [NativeAot] List<T> in options pattern not work in nativeaot mode #74436
  • Process exits silently with FailFastException thrown in Thread::StaticInitialize #74432
    Future
  • [wasm] Clean up environment helpers duplicated from emscripten #74423
    8.0.0
  • Unable to run binaries located on network shares #74418
  • ClientWebSocket options are potentially silently ignored in case an invoker is passed #74416
    7.0.0
  • Potential premature dispose of HTTP/2 connection in ClientWebSocket #74415
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests fails #74413
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests fail #74411
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Http.Tests.HttpRequestMessageTest.BlobUri_Marshal_CorrectValues_Browser test fails #74409
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.XmlSchemaSet.Tests fail #74408
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.XmlSchema.XmlSchemaValidatorApi.Tests fail #74407
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Xml.RW.XmlSystemPathResolver.Tests fail #74406
    8.0.0
  • Tar: archive creation should detect hard links to same file #74404
    8.0.0
  • .NET 6 reading standard output blocks on Linux #74402
  • Fail to get_free_region in thread_final_regions due to low memory for mark array might lead to AV. #74401
    7.0.0
  • Directories created by extracting from a tar file do not have timestamps set #74398
    8.0.0
  • UTF-8 marshalling of string fields is broken #74394
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Spmi-diff is showing diffs that are not related to the PR #74287
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbWeight == BB_ZERO_WEIGHT' in 'Castle.DynamicProxy.Contributors.ProxyInstanceContributor:ImplementProxyTargetAccessor(Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.ClassEmitter,Castle.DynamicProxy.Generators.Emitters.SimpleAST.FieldReference):this' during 'Invert loops' #74218
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\valuetypes\\nullable\\castclass\\null\\castclass-null019\\castclass-null019.cmd #74206
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\CodeGenBringUpTests\\DivConst_r\\DivConst_r.cmd #74044
    7.0.0
  • Official build failed on linux-musl-arm64 due to NRE in crossgen2 #69454
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72389
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Rate Limiter #65400
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #74319
  • F5 to run Blazor WebAssembly App project, register and log in on the web page, then log out, click login again, the web page will be crash. #74064
  • Need to run non-English text through UTF8Encoding for PGO scenarios #57698
    7.0.0
  • Tar: behavior for symbolic links to directories #74214
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_Cancellation_Test_NonParallel.CancelPendingRequest_DropsStalledConnectionAttempt #72977
    7.0.0
  • Is it possible to create a x509Certificate2 with the CA, client.cert and client.key? #74250
    Future
  • Impersonation via Kerberos and HttpClient leads to TCP port exhaustion #74078
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Perf_Utf8Encoding for Greek and Cyrillic #52313
    8.0.0
  • [android][debugger] Debugger doesn't work on emulator when a VPN is involved #74429
  • clr build fails on Windows ARM64 #74375
  • [arm64 Linux] SIGSEGV when trying to run any tests build locally #74403
  • reference binding to null pointer caught by ubsan #74284
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'srcInterval->registerType == registerType' in 'JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.Arm.Helpers:BitwiseSelect(float,float,float):float' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #74373
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests Fails on iOS/tvOS #51398
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Console.Tests fail on Android #50575
    Future
  • .NET 7 exception on Android with EnableLLVM=true #73003
    7.0.0
  • Xml_TypeWithReadOnlyMyCollectionProperty failing on CI #1395
  • [API Proposal]: Add JsonOptional attribute for properties that may or may not be present when serialized/deserialized. #74285
  • HttpClient.DefaultProxy doesn't understand socks when populated from an environment variable #71215
    8.0.0
  • `TarEntry.ExtractToFile` does not set the last write time of the file to the local time #73825
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64Int64SumTest #74127
    7.0.0
  • [debugger] CORDBG_E_MISSING_METADATA error when inspecting EF Core classes in .Net 6 #68929
    8.0.0
  • TarFile.ExtractToDirectory() doesn't work sometimes with compressed archives #74242
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Int128/Int128TestFieldLayout/Int128TestFieldLayout.sh #74318
    7.0.0
  • AccessViolationException with PublishSingleFile #62145
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'compiler->lvaCallSpCheck != 0xCCCCCCCC && compiler->lvaGetDesc(compiler->lvaCallSpCheck)->lvDoNotEnregister && compiler->lvaGetDesc(compiler->lvaCallSpCheck)->lvOnFrame' in 'Test_skippage5_cs.Program:Test(C):int' during 'Generate code' #74129
    7.0.0
  • [R2R] Debug assert failing for condition that is definitely true #74253
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage (#74300) #74464
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix symlink detection in tests #74462
    area-System.IO
  • Delete `GTF_VAR_CAST` #74461
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix issues found in recent Int128 ABI change #74460
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [release/7.0] [debugger][wasm] Fixes trying to evaluate a debugger helper function in a non-wasm page. #74458
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix write barriers in NativeAOT #74455
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [mono] Disable failing Globalization and Transactions tests #74454
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1][mini] double quote linker path in defined(LD_NAME) case #74453
    blocking-release, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mini] double quote linker path in defined(LD_NAME) case #74451
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [QUIC] Root listener/connection while waiting on new connection/stream event #74450
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [release/7.0] Backport tar bug fixes and improvements #74449
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] Disable VerifyXmlResolver test. #74447
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.CodeStyle package #74445
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • AOT ILC using a LKG bits #74435
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable failing Globalization and Transactions tests #74433
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono
  • Expose JsonSerializer.IsReadOnly and MakeReadOnly() APIs. #74431
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cross-compile cross-compilers for non-x64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve windows hardware exception handling performance #74426
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Collect SPMI for TechEmpower benchmarks #74420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] simple perf tests for JavaScript interop #74419
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] Fix missing cross-origin headers when running the browser-eventpipe sample #74410
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http

Merged

  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses V2 #73661
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Fix setting weight for inverted loop condition block #74444
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change superpmi.py collect default to not clean/verify MCH #74438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #74300
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix issues found in recent Int128 ABI change #74386
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [debugger][wasm] Fixes trying to evaluate a debugger helper function in a non-wasm page. #74434
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-rc1] hold reference to SslContextHandle to prevent crashes #74367
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.0
  • Backport: work around GitHub .patch URL issue #74452
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix RegexExperiment.ViewSampleRegexInDGML test #74397
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/7.0] Add Fedora 38 RID #74377
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add tests for exotic external tar asset archives, fix some more corner case bugs #74412
    area-System.IO
  • Disable VerifyXmlResolver test. #74417
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Skip directory symlink recursion on TarFile archive creation #74376
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Improve DOTNET_JitDisasm and introduce DOTNET_JitDisasmSummary #74392
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: finish converting all phases to use common post phase dumps and checks #74308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74350
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Rewrite PendingConnectionTimeout tests #74427
    area-System.Net.Http
  • #50575 default case color behaviour is enabled #74349
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix strnstr in jitconfig.cpp #74421
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Disable new tests about JMC in Firefox #74344
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable HTTP & SSL stress runs on release/7.0 #74422
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove undefined dereference of `null` #74378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use the regType for extracting the RegisterType #74399
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `lvOverlappingFields` #72356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Only enable Arm intrinsics for full aot mode #74301
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • support using socks proxy through env vars #74369
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Remove assert from Http3Connection.SendAsync #74348
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Set modified timestamps on files being extracted from tar archives #74400
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix mono package versions during stabilization #74368
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm-mt] Fix cross-origin headers when running the browser threads sample test #74342
    area-Build-mono
  • SkipBlockAlignmentPadding must be executed for all entries #74396
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Use BOOL (vs. bool) in event pipe qcall signatures #74389
    EventPipe, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix per-call stack checks on x86 #74283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Update workload manifest paths #74364
    area-Meta

Updated

  • Reenable class-memaccess warning #74363
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow more than 64 ISA flags for jit interface. #73965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] improve samples #74371
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove unnecessary runtime lookup for constrained callvirt #73823
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Assert that we don't need to inflate types when applying DIM overrides #74379
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add support for indefinite length arrays #74215
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Use the scoped keyword in LibraryImportGenerator #73479
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • try to port ASCIIUtility.WidenAsciiToUtf16 to x-plat intrinsics #73055
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [Unix]: AcceptAsync with existing AcceptSocket support on Unix #73499
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Handle Timer jitter #74360
    area-System.Threading
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not create `ADDR(HWI/SIMD)` in the inliner #74276
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0][mono][jit] Don't memset memory in increments lower than word size #74351
    Servicing-consider, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.x
  • [docs] begin documenting how to use EventPipe-based profiled AOT for Mono #72864
    documentation, area-Tracing-mono
  • Enable Console Logging test in NativeAOT #74381
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Contain memory operands under casts #72719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Clone all local addresses when importing `dup` #72714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Draft of optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Update OutOfMemoryException message #74374
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: strategy for PRs for RyuJIT with optimisations on #1964

PullRequests

Updated

  • Test infrastructure integration #1963

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HttpClient fails to connect over SSL when running `dotnet 3.1` on Fedora:36 #27360

Closed

  • `dotnet restore` doesn't restore dependencies included in a `.props` file from a referenced package #27383
  • dotnet sdk check throws exception when trying to print installed runtimes. #26509
  • [API Compat] add rule that ensures there is not attribute differences in between sides #23905
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • add rule to detect change in method parameter names #27380
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #27371
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Added support of C#11 to templates #27361
    Servicing-approved, Area-Templates, 7.0.1xx

Merged

  • Fix resolving assembly reference paths from dirs #27362
    Area-ApiCompat
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27241
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rule for detecting attribute differences #26891
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Fix AttributesMustMatch InvalidOperationException #27367
  • Add solution filter for template engine #27328
    Area-Infrastructure, area: dotnet new
  • added and altered readme files after moving `dotnet new` and templates #27330
    Area-Templates, area: dotnet new
  • Only reference the needed packages #27322
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1960711 #27345
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update minimum msbuild for RC2 #26872
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Update AO test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ubuntu version #27193
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0074 should not fire on null coalescing assignment with function pointers #63551
  • Register additional document code fix/refactoring provider by ContentType #63547
  • IDE refactor to file-scope namespace corrupts C# file #63542
  • Edit.SubwordExpandSelection should not include quotes #63539
  • Add register method for analyzing embedded languages #63533
    Backlog

Closed

  • Getting the "Feature 'Navigate to' is currently unavailable due to an internal error" error #56985
    17.3
  • StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: This program location is thought to be unreachable. #61165
    17.3
  • IDE0200 (lambda expression can be removed) results in compile error (partial method) #63465
    17.4
  • 'Extract base class' doesn't work well for records #62415
    17.4
  • NullReferenceException assigning ref field in object initializer #63434
    17.4
  • Completion window doesn't appear after commiting compiler directives #38289
    Backlog
  • Accessing static abstract operators gives unclear error message #62614
    17.4
  • Document breaking change regarding interface usage as type argument #62355
    17.4
  • Go to definition on NotImplementedException ctor opens TypeNameParser.cs #63532
    17.4 P1
  • GTD fails for subsequent symbol navigation with SourceLink #63424

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't report an issue for predictable failures #63550
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unused extensions #63549
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1962551 #63548
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade System.Memory to fully fix another MSBuild loading issue #63545
    Area-IDE
  • Update versions of external packages we reference #63544
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Binder.CheckValue - adjust an assert for DiscardExpression to handle ref assignment. #63534
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, New Language Feature - Ref Reassignment

Merged

  • Do not access Workspace off of a Solution instance. #63537
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid linq overhead and having to create secondary result #63540
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove unused extension method #63538
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix version check #63541
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not offer to remove lambda if it would create a delegate out of a partial method #63543
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cherry-pick 62946 to 17.3 #63495
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Update xcopy msbuild version for .net7p7 #63535
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Extract Base Record Pass 1 #63528
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid accessing the Workspaec off of a Solution in features that want to know if they can make a change. #63536
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve cross-project add-using results #63449
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement lowering for ref field assignment in object initializers #63531
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, Next
  • Trigger keyword completions in compiler directives when typing #63510
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix the LSIF indexer's ability to load MSBuild projects and solutions #63527
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do symbol mapping in Go To Def #63439
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63554
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #63553
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add Target-type Conversion Errors for Lambdas with Default Parameters #63448
    Area-Compilers
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #63496
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Move Windows builds to new images #63498
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic Snippets - fix tabstop location for cursor in blocks #63519
    Area-IDE
  • Add telemetry for the time and files outputted for source generators #63088
    Area-IDE
  • Filter out `RequiredMemberAttribute` from metadata symbols #63497
    Area-Compilers
  • CSharp.DeclarationTable – avoid realizing lazy roots during add/remove operations. #63517
    Area-Compilers
  • IDE0220 (foreach cast): Consider T of IEnumerable<T> for weakly-typed GetEnumerator #63472
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Editorconfig valueholder #63483
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Track 'default(T)' null checks #63444
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Expose IsGeneratedCode boolean property on diagnostic analyzer contexts #63447
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • No IDE0060 for unused parameter in partial method implementation #63530
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semantic snippets - foreach snippet #63058
    Area-IDE
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Inheritance of base positional records #63525
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Explore use of compression in sqlite #63111
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • Hovering in .editorconfig files #63188
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow option for DataProtection keys to not be cached #43500
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Feature] Blazor QuickGrid add the ability to be able to export all data or filtered data to a pdf , csv, html #43499
  • FileStreamResult results in sensitive data being logged #43495
  • Support Deprecation Metadata in the API Explorer #43493
  • Blazor Server - NotAuthorized content is shown before Authorization is finished #43492
  • VS 2022 Stuck Launching Angular SPA and Never Redirects #43491
  • Make SystemTextJsonInputFormatter IAsyncEnumerable aware #43489
  • [Blazor] how to disable the [parameter] feature inherit from component? #43486
  • Change argument null exceptions to use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #43482

Closed

  • What is the application that I have to allow in the firewall for a gRPC hosted in an ASP Core application? #43393
  • Provide documentation to use Owin correctly with ASP.NET Core #39943
    Backlog
  • I am getting a System.NullReferenceError when I am using a .NET MAUI Blazor app #43448
  • Better MSAL support for additional scenarios #38122
    7.0-rc1
  • In Blazor WebAssembly, allow dynamic query string parameters when redirecting to IDP #33784
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor Webassembly AAD and AAD B2C support improvements #27549
    7.0-rc1
  • Provide a way to set loginHint in Blazor with AAD auth #19925
    7.0-rc1
  • .Net 5 RC2 - Blazor Wasm - AAD B2C SignUpSignIn catch error 'AADB2C90118' to start Password Reset userflow #27119
    Backlog
  • Add support for "prompt="select_user" with WASM / MSAL #32640
    7.0-rc1
  • Support passing more options to WASM AAD auth #32782
    7.0-rc1
  • Blazor Azure ADB2C Authentication popup size does not match content #37365
    7.0-rc1
  • Authentication Failure Doesn't Display Failure Reason #43029
    7.0-rc1
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets - An improvement proposal #42220
    Discussions
  • Publishing a Standalone to linux server with new base path, unable to make it work #43487
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs #43447
  • RateLimitingMiddleware throws TaskCanceledException #43473
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Update CredScanSuppressions.json #43497
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Web.Xdt version #43490
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Use the new Photo Picker on Android 11+ in Essentials Picker API #9615
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Introduce the Generic.xaml concept #9612

    Backlog

  • Problem with Shell back button #9604

  • Problem with object on Android platform #9601
  • MAUI iOS is not working properly after it is delivered to Appstore, or TestFlight #9597
  • GraphicsView does not call Drawable's Draw() after each Invalidate on iOS #9595
    Backlog
  • Searchbar keyboard is switching back to alphabet characters immediately after entering one numeric character #9594
    Backlog

Closed

  • ZIndex Xaml Markup Causes Crash on Release Build but Not Debug #9554

  • No role is defined for "Click here to view full recipe" control. #6473

  • .NET MAUI App Service/Background Task #9598

  • Label with TextType=Html crash when set & to Text property. #9596
  • Send mail via System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient isn't working on Android, but on Windows #9587
  • Cannot compile for build 17763 (Windows 10 version 1809) #9463
  • Cross-platform solution for Right click context menu on desktop app #7777
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Picker ItemsSource binding failed #9496
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ItemsSource cannot be changed on a Picker on Windows #9239
    .NET 7 Planning

PullRequests

Created

Merged

    7.0-rc1
  • [Windows] Notify changes in Picker ItemsSource #9584
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9593
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Secondary ButtonMask #9589

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json: consider using nested JSON_MODIFY changing individual properties rather than using common denominator #28855
  • Make more metadata and reflection helpers public so then can be used for public conventions #28854
  • Prevent EF Core from generating foreign key #28853
  • Improve ObjectRemovedFromModel exception message #28852
  • How to properly migrate column from nullable to non-nullable #28849
  • EF7 TPC Mapping Strategy generates duplicate index names for navigation properties declared in base type #28848
  • JSON: add support for partial update to update just a single scalar property, rather than entire entities #28845

Closed

  • ExecuteUpdate with cross apply produces invalid SQL #28823
    7.0.0
  • The instance of entity type cannot be tracked because another instance with the same key value for { 'ID'} is already being tracked. #28822
  • Exception: "Unable to cast object of type" in many stored procs mapping cases #28803
    7.0.0
  • When you run "dotnet ef migrations add Blogs" in command prompt, you get an error: "your startup project doesn't reference Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design." #28785
  • Collection initilization with EF Core 7 #28847
  • Map JSON values stored in database to EF properties #4021
    7.0.0-rc1
  • Very inefficient SQL generated for simple table-split query since 3.0. #28829

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Fix issue with required navigation and query filters #28858
  • Query: Avoid repeated visitation of subquery in sql translator #28857
  • Use unmapped FKs for topological order when propagating store-generated values #28851
  • Fix to #28595 - Use partial updates for JSON #28844

Merged

  • ExecuteUpdate: Correctly identify when we need to cause a subquery join #28834
    auto-merge
  • Avoid nullability warnings w/ new XUnit.Assert #28843
    auto-merge
  • Fix base parameter index calculation for sprocs #28850
    auto-merge
  • Query: Update formatting of Update command #28797
    auto-merge
  • Merge rc1 to release/7.0 #28839
